chunks.title: Dungeonpunk Dev Vault – File Naming Rules
chunks.summary: `YYYY-MM-DD_CATEGORY_Short-Slug_vN.md` --- - **YYYY-MM-DD** – Date of creation (date first written, not last edited) - **CATEGORY** – All caps, one word, main type: - `MECHANIC` – Core gameplay mechanics - `SYSTEM` – Game systems and subsystems - `LORE` – Setting, story, characters, factions - `QUES…

chunks.path: 01 – Game Bible/Core Vision/01 - Game BibleCore Vision2025-08-14_CORE_Vision_Goals_v1.md
chunks.title: Core Vision – Goals (v1)
chunks.summary: - Sword & sorcery heat: brutal, decadent, scarce mercy - Bard-only diegetic music system (music from bards in-world) - Harem-bond telepathy as social glue & combat spice

chunks.title: Auto AI Index Pack
chunks.summary: This pack adds: - `generate_ai_index.py` — scans the repo for `.md` / `.txt` files and writes `AI_INDEX.md` with raw links. - `.github/workflows/build-ai-index.yml` — GitHub Action that runs on every push to `main` and commits updates.

chunks.title: Auto Netlify Index Pack
chunks.summary: Generates `index.html` in the root **and every subfolder** with correctly URL-encoded links. Runs on every push via GitHub Actions; Netlify will deploy browsable indexes automatically. 1) Unzip into the **root of your repo**. 2) Commit & push: git add generate_site_index.py .github/workflows/build-s…

chunks.title: # Auto-Generated Pages
chunks.summary: - [AI Quicklinks](AI_QUICKLINKS.md) — top active notes (with Raw links) - [Tags Index](TAGS_INDEX.md) — browse by #tag (see /tags/) - [Change Feed](CHANGE_FEED.md) — commits in the last 14 days - [Cache Snapshot](cache.html) — inline content of top notes for fast reads

chunks.title: Quicklinks Automation Pack
chunks.summary: This pack auto-builds: - AI_QUICKLINKS.md (top active notes) - Injects a Quicklinks block at the top of AI_INDEX.md (between markers) - Updates Netlify `_redirects` (/quick, /core, /systems, /lore, /rd) 1) Unzip into the **root of your repo**. 2) Commit & push: git add generate_quicklinks.py .github…
